text: ' is a type of Japanese pottery that is a form of Kyō ware from Kyoto.http://history-porcelain-japan.com/kyo.html It is related to other Kyō wares such as Awata ware and Kiyomizu ware, but denotes the kiln it originates from.http://history-porcelain-japan.com/kyo.html == References == == External links == * http://www.metmuseum.org/art/collection/search/667256 * http://www.metmuseum.org/art/collection/search/44927 * http://www.jan-fineart- london.com/collection?id=426 Category:Culture in Kyoto Prefecture Category:Japanese pottery
title: Mizoro ware
